## WebMapLayers.addFeatureLayer() method

Shortcut for [WebMapLayers.addGeoJsonLayer()](./webmap.webmaplayers.addgeojsonlayer.md) to initialize adapter with generic types for working in typescript

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```
